Package com.arbergashi.charts.util

package com.arbergashi.charts.util
Utility and support helpers for scaling, colors, and numeric transforms.

Includes helper classes used by renderers (scales, colors, math helpers) that are allocation-conscious and suitable for hot paths.

Since:
2026-01-30
Version:
2.0.0
Author:
Arber Gashi
  • Class
    Description
    AnimationUtils
    High-performance animation and interpolation utilities for ArberCharts.
    AnimationUtils.EasingType
    Easing function selector.
    CacheUtils
    Utility for bounded LRU caches.
    ChartAssets
    Central configuration registry for ArberCharts.
    ChartI18N
    Internationalization (public API) facade.
    ChartScale
    Utility for DPI scaling.
    ChartUtils
    Helper methods for coordinate transformations.
    ColorRegistry
    Flyweight cache for immutable ArberColor instances.
    ColorUtils
    Color utilities.
    FastNumberFormatter
    Lightweight formatter for fixed-point numbers without allocations.
    FormatUtils
    Utilities for formatting numbers efficiently.
    LatencyTracker
    Rolling latency tracker for render timings (zero-allocation).
    MathUtils
    Math utilities.
    NiceScale
    Calculates "nice" numbers for graph axes.
    NiceScale.ScaleMode
    Supported scale types for axes produced by NiceScale.
    PhysicalScaleProfiles
    Preset profiles for physical (mm-based) chart scaling.
    PhysicalScaleProfiles.Profile
    Simple immutable profile holder.
    PredictiveMath
    Small predictive helpers kept allocation-free for render-time use.
